definitions: To change the form, character, or function of something.
To cause someone to change their religious, political, or other beliefs.
To exchange something for something else of a different form, type, or value.
To change from one system or unit to another.
examples: They plan to convert the old factory into apartments.
She converted to Buddhism last year.
You can convert your foreign currency at the bank.
We need to convert these measurements to metric units.
